OmniUiCard.dataSourceConfig: {"dataSource":{"type":"Query","value":{"dsDelay":"","query":"SELECT Status, Sub_Status__c, Appeal_Filed__c, Appeal_Status__c, Rejected_Date__c, Unit_Offered_Date__c,Calculated_Rejected_Date__c,Calculated_Unit_Offered_Date__c FROM IndividualApplication WHERE Id = '{Parent.Id}'","jsonMap":"{\"recordId\":\"{recordId}\",\"Parent.Id\":\"{Parent.Id}\",\"User.userProfileName\":\"{User.userProfileName}\"}","resultVar":""},"orderBy":{"name":"","isReverse":""},"contextVariables":[{"name":"recordId","val":"0iTcn000001wguLEAQ","id":2},{"name":"Parent.Id","val":"0iTcn000001wguLEAQ","id":3},{"name":"User.userProfileName","val":"HCR Applicant Community Login","id":0}]},"state2element0_0":{"type":"DataRaptor","value":{"dsDelay":"","bundle":"InitiateApprovalProcessPlatformEvent","bundleType":"Load","inputMap":{"DevelopmentId":"{Parent.DevelopmentId}","UserId":"{Parent.UserId}"},"jsonMap":"{\"Parent.DevelopmentId\":\"{Parent.DevelopmentId}\",\"Parent.UserId\":\"{Parent.UserId}\"}"},"orderBy":{"name":"","isReverse":""},"contextVariables":[{"name":"Parent.DevelopmentId","val":"","id":1},{"name":"Parent.UserId","val":"","id":3}]},"state0element0_0":{"type":null,"value":{"bundleType":"Extract"},"orderBy":{},"contextVariables":[]},"state1element0_0":{"type":"DataRaptor","value":{"dsDelay":"","bundle":"MCJWaitlistApplicantStatusUpdate","bundleType":"Load","inputMap":{"Id":"{Parent.Id}","Status":"Offered"},"jsonMap":"{\"Parent.Status\":\"{Parent.Status}\",\"Parent.Id\":\"{Parent.Id}\"}"},"orderBy":{"name":"","isReverse":""},"contextVariables":[{"name":"Parent.Status","val":"Draft","id":0},{"name":"Parent.Id","val":"","id":1}]}}
